statements: DELETE FROM palm_vein_recognition WHERE recognition_result = FALSE;
DELETE FROM palm_vein_recognition WHERE id = 1 AND recognition_result = TRUE;
DELETE FROM palm_vein_recognition WHERE attendance_timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND user_id = 5;

DELETE FROM attendance_records WHERE user_id = 3 AND attendance_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM palm_vein_logs WHERE user_id = 101 AND log_timestamp < '2021-07-01';
DELETE FROM attendance_records WHERE attendance_status = 'Absent' OR attendance_status = 'Late';
DELETE FROM attendance_records WHERE user_id = 101 AND date = '2022-01-10';
